Greetings.

I ran across an instance where a validly constructed uri in a PDF document
doesn't seem to be acted upon by Heritrix 1.14.

The uri, which points to another PDF, is within the scope of the crawl and
the PDF that contains the uri is successfully crawled. The caveat is that
the uri will in actuality generate a 404 response.

Looking through the crawl log, I would nevertheless expect to see the
attempt to access the uri, but there is no such entry in the log.

Any ideas as to what is going on or where/how I can track what (if anything)
the PDF Extractor is doing with the uri (and/or its "parent" PDF document)?

thanks in advance,

anselm h.
